field.note:
This message is sent when a user changes the status of the asset to Live after the asset workflow is complete. If this is empty, a generic message will be used.

Keywords available to this message subject and body include:

  • %asset_name%, %type_code% - The name and type code of the asset whose workflow has been started.
  • %status% - The previous status
  • %asset_url% - The URL of this asset.
  • All other available asset keywords such as %asset_metadata_<fieldname>%, %asset_updated%, etc.
